Enums/BLTNViewPosition.html#/c:@M@BLTNBo.name: centered
Enums/BLTNViewPosition.html#/c:@M@BLTNBo.abstract: The view is centered in its parent container.

Enums/BLTNViewPosition.html#/c:@M@BLTNBo.name: pinnedToEdges
Enums/BLTNViewPosition.html#/c:@M@BLTNBo.abstract: The view is pinned to the four edges of its parent container.

Enums/BLTNStatusBarAppearance.html#/c:@M.name: automatic
Enums/BLTNStatusBarAppearance.html#/c:@M.abstract: The color of the status bar is determined automatically. This is the default style.

Enums/BLTNStatusBarAppearance.html.name: BLTNStatusBarAppearance
Enums/BLTNStatusBarAppearance.html.abstract: Styles of status bar to use with bulletin items.

Enums/BLTNViewPosition.html.name: BLTNViewPosition
Enums/BLTNViewPosition.html.abstract: Describes the position of a view inside of its parent container.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: backgroundColor
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: The background color of the bulletin card. Defaults to white.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: backgroundViewStyle
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: The style of the view covering the content. Defaults to .dimmed.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: statusBarAppearance
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: The style of status bar to use with the bulltin. Defaults to .automatic.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: statusBarAnimation
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: The style of status bar animation. Defaults to .fade.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: hidesHomeIndicator
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: The home indicator for iPhone X should be hidden or not. Defaults to false.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: edgeSpacing
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: The spacing between the edge of the screen and the edge of the card. Defaults to regular.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: cardCornerRadius
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: The rounded corner radius of the bulletin card. Defaults to 12, and 36 on iPhone X.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: allowsSwipeInteraction
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: Whether swipe to dismiss should be allowed. Defaults to true.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.name: init(rootItem:)
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@M@BLTNB.abstract: Creates a bulletin manager and sets the first item to display.s

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: present(_:animated:completion:)
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Presents a view controller above the bulletin card.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/s:9BLTNBoa.name: withContentView(_:)
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/s:9BLTNBoa.abstract: Performs an operation with the bulletin content view and returns the result.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: displayActivityIndicator(color:)
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Hides the contents of the stack and displays an activity indicator view.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: hideActivityIndicator()
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Hides the activity indicator and displays the current item.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: push(item:)
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Displays a new item after the current one.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: popItem()
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Removes the current item from the stack and displays the previous item.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: popToRootItem()
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Removes all the items from the stack and displays the root item.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: displayNextItem()
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Displays the next item, if the next property of the current item is set.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: showBulletin(above:animated:completion:)
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Presents the bulletin above the specified view controller.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.name: dismissBulletin(animated:)
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html#/c:@CM@BLTN.abstract: Dismisses the bulletin and clears the current page. You will have to call prepare before

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: actionButtonColor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The tint color to apply to the action button (default blue).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: actionButtonTitleColor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The title color to apply to action button (default white).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: actionButtonBorderColor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The border color to apply to action button.

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: actionButtonBorderWidth
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The border width to apply to action button.

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: alternativeButtonTitleColor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The title color to apply to the alternative button (default blue).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: alternativeButtonBorderColor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The border color to apply to the alternative button.

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: alternativeButtonBorderWidth
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The border width to apply to the alternative button.

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: imageViewTintColor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The tint color to apply to the imageView (if image rendered in template mode, default blue).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: titleTextColor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The color of title text labels (default light gray).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: descriptionTextColor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The color of description text labels (default black).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: actionButtonCornerRadius
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The corner radius of the action button (default 12).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: alternativeButtonCornerRadius
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The corner radius of the alternative button (default 12).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: titleFontDescriptor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: An optional custom font to use for the title label. Set this to nil to use the system font.

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: descriptionFontDescriptor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: An optional custom font to use for the description label. Set this to nil to use the system font.

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: buttonFontDescriptor
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: An optional custom font to use for the buttons. Set this to nil to use the system font.

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: shouldUseCompactDescriptionText
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: Whether the description text should be displayed with a smaller font.

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: titleFontSize
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The font size of title elements (default 30).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: descriptionFontSize
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The font size of description labels (default 20).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: compactDescriptionFontSize
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The font size of compact description labels (default 15).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: actionButtonFontSize
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The font size of action buttons (default 17).

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.name: alternativeButtonFontSize
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html#/c:@M@BL.abstract: The font size of alternative buttons (default 15).

Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.name: item
Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The item for which the interface builder was created.

Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.name: appearance
Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.abstract: The appearance to use to generate the items.

Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.name: makeTextField(placeholder:returnKey:delegate:)
Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Creates a standard text field with an optional delegate.

Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.name: makeGroupStack(spacing:)
Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Creates a stack view to contain a group of objects.

Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.name: wrapView(_:width:height:position:)
Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Wraps a view without intrinsic content size inside a view with an intrinsic content size.

Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.name: dimmed
Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.abstract: The background is covered with a semi-transparent view similar to the view displayed behind

Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.name: blurred(style:isDark:)
Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.abstract: The background is blurred with the specified effect.

Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.name: blurredLight
Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.abstract: The background blurred with a light style.

Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.name: blurredExtraLight
Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.abstract: The background blurred with an extra light style.

Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.name: blurredDark
Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html#/c:.abstract: The background blurred with a dark style.

Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html.name: BLTNBackgroundViewStyle
Classes/BLTNBackgroundViewStyle.html.abstract: The types of background used to cover the content behind the bulletins.

Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html.name: BLTNInterfaceBuilder
Classes/BLTNInterfaceBuilder.html.abstract: Generates interface elements for bulletins. Use this class to create custom bulletin items with

Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html.name: BLTNItemAppearance
Classes/BLTNItemAppearance.html.abstract: An object that defines the appearance of bulletin items.

Classes/BLTNItemManager.html.name: BLTNItemManager
Classes/BLTNItemManager.html.abstract: An object that manages the presentation of a bulletin.
